text: Jean Rogers (March 25, 1916 â€“ February 24, 1991) was an American movie actress. She starred in movie serials in the 1930s and B-movies in the 1940s. She played Dale Arden in the two movie serials Flash Gordon (1936) and Flash Gordon's Trip to Mars (1938).Obituary Variety, March 4, 1991. She was wanted for the third and final serial, Flash Gordon Conquers the Universe, but declined. ==References== Category:American movie actors Category:Movie serial actors Category:1916 births Category:1991 deaths
title: Jean Rogers
